mapper.select: SELECT ci.cart_item_id, ci.user_no, ci.gds_no, ci.store_id, ci.gds_stts_no, ci.quantity, ci.added_at, ci.updated_at, ci.is_chc_ord, p.gds_nm, p.last_sel_prc, GROUP_CONCAT(pov.vl_nm SEPARATOR ', ') AS opt_nm FROM cart_items ci LEFT JOIN products p ON ci.gds_no = p.gds_no LEFT JOIN product_status ps ON ci.gds_stts_no = ps.gds_stts_no LEFT JOIN status_option_mappings som ON ps.gds_stts_no = som.gds_stts_no LEFT JOIN product_option_values pov ON som.opt_vl_no = pov.opt_vl_no WHERE ci.user_no = #{userNo} GROUP BY ci.cart_item_id ORDER BY ci.added_at DESC
SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(cart_item_id, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) FROM cart_items WHERE cart_item_id LIKE 'cart_id_%';
SELECT cart_item_id, user_no, gds_no, store_id, gds_stts_no, quantity, added_at, updated_at, is_chc_ord FROM cart_items WHERE cart_item_id = #{cartItemId}
